Articles.Content: Hello, today i was flying an unmanned mission to the mun. when i got behind it i lost signal. the thing that it's strange is that in orbit of the mun there is already a satellite and it is connected to ksp and in line of sight. why my ship wont connect to this satellite??
Sounds like the other satellite doesn't have a relay antenna. Only some antennas can be used as relays. The wiki has a chart showing which can be used: Antenna - Kerbal Space Program Wiki
